title: Digital Rights Communities Meetup
abstract: A place for digital rights NGOs and activists to share their stories and network.
description:
Almost all of us have some connection to the topic, but we want to give you a chance to share what is going on in your country or city, how your fight for maintaining our digital rights looks like.
You'll have the chance to share in a lightning-talk style what you or your organisation has been up to, no longer than 3 minutes, so bring your stories if you'd like.
Afterwards we'll probably have plenty of topics to talk about, and continue over a Tschunk or two.
